Light Instruction
info:
You can control the fill light by this node.

You can also change the previous nodes to other functions to control the light on/off based on time or other occations.

name: Preview Demo
info:
In this demo, we created sliders for IoU and Confidence that you can play with. We also created UI to display some counting demos.
Feel free to adjust this page for your own needs.
